excerpt: "USA TODAY has previously debunked claims that AI-generated images show satanic-themed merchandise being sold at Target and Hobby Lobby. USA TODAY reached out to the Facebook user who shared the post for comment but did not immediately receive a response. The TikTok user couldn't be contacted."
